column1: Every union is a funeral for two souls.  Kabbalistic Fragment
Love binds more tightly than iron shackles.  Occult Maxim
The kiss is the first sacrifice upon the altar of the body.  Alchemical Saying
Choice is the cruelest form of freedom; two roads end in one grave.  Mystical Fragment
The angel above the Lovers carries both blessing and blade.  Hermetic Aphorism
Hearts joined in fire become indistinguishable ash.  Esoteric Fragment
